articles.description: Tulip Siddiq is accused of helping her aunt, the former prime minister of Bangladesh, embezzle up to £4bn.

articles.description: Cost of kennelling seized dogs soars and in many areas attacks continue to rise, forces tell the BBC.

articles.description: Water bills to rise by £31 a year on average in England and Wales over the next five years, regulator says

articles.description: Spain's state-owned shipbuilder confirms it is buying Harland & Wolff, best known for the Titanic.

articles.description: In an interview with Jeremy Bowen, the leader of the rebel group HTS says sanctions on Syria should be lifted.
